content.raw:
I hope to install an updated version gazebo,as it solves the bug of `reference frame` of `fdir1`.  I am using ros-kinetic now, however, there is no `ros-kinetic-gazebo9-ros-pkgs` yet. I had to install `ros-kinetic-gazbeo8-ros-pkgs`, which could not work. I don't know how to solve the problem, do I need to uninstall gazebo9 and install gazebo8?? Thank you.
Here is the wrong.
```
#!linux

Segmentation fault (core dumped)
/opt/ros/kinetic/lib/gazebo_ros/gazebo: 46: kill: invalid signal number or name: SIGINT

```
content.html:
I hope to install an updated version gazebo,as it solves the bug of reference frame of fdir1. I am using ros-kinetic now, however, there is no ros-kinetic-gazebo9-ros-pkgs yet. I had to install ros-kinetic-gazbeo8-ros-pkgs, which could not work. I don't know how to solve the problem, do I need to uninstall gazebo9 and install gazebo8?? Thank you. Here is the wrong.
